ygData.subject: Re: [RE: [EQ_women] RP Server in Test]
ygData.msgSnippet: Well having actually joined a guild for DAoC RP, I am committed now.  Of course, I was certain I d be switching as soon as I read about it and the guild is
ygData.messageBody:
Well having actually joined a guild for DAoC RP, I am committed now. Of
course, I was certain I'd be switching as soon as I read about it and the
guild is filled with old EQ guildies and I'm excited. In fact, since
Highlander is one of the races (we're playing Albion) one of the other reasons
for starting a Shaman was to get into character a bit.

But, do tell... what did Verant say in the Brit mag that has you upset. I do
love gossip (plus, I finished a chunk of work and am just waiting until time
to go home :-)

Ice
